data.title: The Way of the Wayfarer: God's Holiness
data.meta_description: God is holy, it is one of the characteristics that defines him. The definition of holiness most of us go by is "set apart". The Bible portrays the word as such but there is a side of holiness we often do not take into account. A side of holiness that makes the story of God and his people make deeper and more meaningful sense. Listen to our first episode to get a more complete view of God's holiness.
